AdGuard cannot filter itself. It would lead to inconsistent performance and cause issues for other apps.
Ask for user permission every time AdGuard blocks network access for the foreground app.

AdGuard Assistant allows you to quickly change settings for an app or a website you have recently used.
AdGuard can expose an API that you can use for setting up custom complicated automation rules via apps like Tasker, AutomateIt, etc.
You must use at least %d characters
The PIN code is a random string value used to authorize API requests.
Available only for Premium app version

"Please note, when AdGuard is on, battery and data usage statistics don't reflect the real situation. Due to app filtering, Android attributes other apps' consumption to AdGuard. As a result, AdGuard's consumption is overestimated."

"When AdGuard is on, battery and data usage statistics don't reflect the real situation. Due to app filtering, Android attributes other apps' consumption to AdGuard. As a result, AdGuard's consumption is overestimated."
Block web requests for ads, beacons and trackers.
Prevent the websites from using the Location API.
Prevent servers from sending notifications to browsers.
It can let others know your real IP address even if you use a proxy or VPN.
Your device does not support certificate installation. Try to do it another way.
Notifications about new application and filter updates.
Notifications that let you manage network access.
Notifications about changes to your license status.
A permanent notification of the outbound proxy status.
A permanent notification of the app protection status and filtering statistics.

The default behavior is to remove the identifying information from the browser. Leave empty to use the default behavior.
This option will become available if you enable \"Hide your User-Agent\"

"Blocks ads and tracking servers by re-routing them to a \"blackhole\" No filters enabled"
"Domain Name System (DNS) servers are the Internet's equivalent of a phone book. They maintain a directory of domain names and translate them to Internet Protocol (IP) addresses."

Downloaded DNS filter is too large and may dramatically slow down AdGuard performance. Are you sure you want to continue?

This option will become available if you enable the DNS module
Does not let third-parties spy on your browsing activity
Does not store your DNS queries logs
Enforces safe search for popular search engines and YouTube
Blocks known malware and phishing domains
Use parallel queries to speed up resolving by simultaneously querying all upstream servers

"If you exit AdGuard, your system will no longer be protected by our firewall and ad-blocking technology.
Do you want to exit?"

Exporting log files and system info
A *.json file will be generated, containing all your settings, enabled filters including the user filter. To use them on another device just use \"Import settings\" menu item.
Decrypt secure (SSL/TLS) connections in order to block encrypted ad requests.
Ad blocking is disabled for this app
To see the actual web requests inside the tunnel, you need to enable HTTPS filtering.
The blocking rule will be deleted from the User filter.
Do you want to change this option for all apps? Otherwise it will be used only for apps with unchanged options.

"For this feature to work correctly, AdGuard needs the \"Usage access\" permission which allows access to app usage history and statistics on your device. On the following screen, select AdGuard and then enable the switch or checkbox for \"Permit usage access.\""
This option will become available if you enable the self-destruction of first-party cookies
Limit the time-to-live (TTL) of first-party cookies
This package can be used by third-party apps to load Google ads. Disabling ad blocking or filtering may result in unblocking some of the in-app ads.
Free alternative DNS service by Google
Tries to trick websites into believing that you have a different IP address.
Prevent third-parties from knowing what website you are visiting.
Hide the queries for websites visited from a search engine.
Remove identifying information from the User-Agent header.
In order to enable HTTPS filtering for this app, you should turn it on system wide.
HTTPS filtering significantly increases the quality of ad blocking on most websites
This option will become available if you enable \"Filter Blacklist only\".
This option will become available if you enable HTTPS filtering
This option will become available if you disable \"Filter Blacklist only\".
Please select Mozilla Firefox as a default browser to perform this action
This app does not trust user certificates, so HTTPS filtering can break its secure connections.
Do you want to import settings from %s?
Enter the URL or path to the file
The firewall functionality is limited in the proxy mode
Certificate is installed into the system certificate store

AdGuard can filter HTTPS in most apps.
Certificate is installed into the user certificate store
"It's time to reload your anti-ad gun!"
One key to block them all

This setting controls logging output. Do not change it without good reason.

Allow us to send you infrequent updates about AdGuard? You can unsubscribe any time.

No application can perform this action!

You do not have Orbot installed. Do you want to install it?
"Orbot didn't start in time. Please check its state and restart it manually if needed."
Device traffic is routed through the proxy server
This option will be available if you enable outbound proxy
"A proxy server is a different computer that tunnels all web requests through itself. With AdGuard's help you can route your device's traffic through any proxy."
Please add at least one proxy server
This option will be available if you enable the proxy notification
Apply the rule to all websites
Give a higher priority to the rule
Apply the rule to third-party requests only
Select Bootstrap DNS for DNS-over-HTTPS and DNS-over-TLS servers.
Forcibly exclude filtering of IPv4 networks. In this case, IPv4 will work, but it will not be filtered.
Forcibly exclude filtering of IPv6 networks. In this case, IPv6 will work, but it will not be filtered.
Forcibly disable filtering for IPv6 networks. In this case, IPv6 will not work at all.
Disable AdGuard automatic root proxy reconfiguration when network connectivity changes.
Disable AdGuard automatic restart functions when disconnecting/connecting to the network.
Disable AdGuard automatic VPN reconfiguration when network connectivity changes.

"Select blocking type for DNS Filtering: 0 Means block requests with NXDomain for Network filtering rules and with IP for Host rules. 1 Means block requests with NXDomain for all kinds of filtering rules. 2 Means block requests with Unspecified IP for Network filtering rules and with given IP for Host filtering rules.
1 will be used as a default value, if entered value is not valid."
List of apps for which AdGuard enforces HTTPS filtering
A fallback DNS resolver that will be used when the configured server is not available. An empty string means using the system default DNS as a fallback.
Forcibly turn on filtering for IPv6 networks. The app does not filter IPv6 on KitKat and for some cell carriers by default.
When possible, VPN will bypass the LAN. However, for complex networks, the LAN is not excluded and all connections will be filtered, including local ones.
Disables the routes we use to exclude LAN from filtering.

WARNING: Only for debugging purposes. If this setting is enabled, AdGuard will create a directory named \"har\" inside the app cache directory. It contains information about all filtered HTTP requests in HAR 1.2 format and can be analyzed with the Fiddler program.
List of IPv4 ranges excluded from filtering. For instance, we do not filter connections to the private IP ranges.
List of IPv6 ranges excluded from filtering.
Block IPv6 when AdGuard works in \"Proxy with automatic setup\" mode.
AdGuard will show information about blocked HTML elements in the filtering log.
AdGuard will clear YouTube app data on booting. Required for YouTube ad blocking.
AdGuard will set the minimum oom_score_adj for its own process in order to stay alive all the time. Requires root access.
AdGuard will pause protection when you open the Samsung Pay application. Requires usage access.
Set initial protection start-up delay, after device boot-up (in seconds).
Show splash screen on AdGuard launch.
Enforce paused notification, even when notification icon type is set to None
Often used on websites with private information
Connections to these ports will be filtered.
Websites for which AdGuard will filter HTTPS
When disabled, everything is filtered except for the Whitelist
"Websites for which AdGuard won't filter HTTPS"
Firefox utilizes its own certificate store
Filter websites with an Extended Validation (EV) Certificate
List of UIDs excluded from filtering.

WARNING: Only for debugging purposes. If this setting is enabled, AdGuard will create the special file named \"tun.pcap\". It contains all network packets transferred through the VPN. This file is located in the app cache directory and can be analyzed with the Wireshark program.
The maximum size of the data packet that is used in local VPN. The recommended interval for the experiments is from 1500 to 9000.
To keep using Premium functions, you need to renew your license.
License expires soon. Days left: {0}. Renew your license to keep using Premium features.
Use apps without ads and trackers
Protect yourself from phishing and malware
You can find a complete list of features and prices on our website.
Block ads in all apps, not only in browsers, and filter all malicious websites by purchasing a Premium License.
Block all known analytics, lower third-party cookie lifetimes.
Lower all cookie lifetimes, remove tracking parameters from URLs. You will need to login on websites periodically.
Disabling browser capabilities that can be used for tracking. Some sites will have problems.
Block over 4,000 tracking servers that watch your every action online.

Tap to activate your Free Trial. No card info required.

Protection was restarted to apply new settings.
Security settings will be opened. Find \"Trusted Credentials\", switch to the \"User\" tab, and remove the AdGuard certificate.
Delete the certificate from the trusted credentials. This operation cannot be undone.
Blocks Google Chrome from sending its version and modifications information to Google domains.
This email will be used to activate a trial version and to register a personal account where you can manage your AdGuard license keys and subscriptions.
Enable \"pref.samsungpay.autopause\" to pause AdGuard when Samsung Pay is running.
Enable \"pref.samsungpay.autopause\" to pause AdGuard when the Samsung Pay app becomes the foreground.
Samsung Pay app may not work correctly in the VPN mode.
Configure each app as you like. AdGuard will remember your settings.
How much traffic AdGuard has saved by blocking ads. Tap to open the chart.
Events blocked or whitelisted via Filtering Log also end up as rules here.
Any domains added to the Whitelist will not be filtered. So you better trust them!
There are many different filter categories, just like there are lots of various tools in a toolbox. Each has its own purpose.

"It displays the web traffic of your device. Different types of events are highlighted with different colors. Green indicates whitelisted events Red is for events blocked by AdGuard Yellow means that the event was modified by AdGuard Tap on any event to show its details."
There are plenty of filters you can use. They differ in purpose and origin.
"Filters… there's so much in this word"
"This toggle turns protection on and off. When it's green all is good!"
The menu provides access to Apps Management, Filtering Log and countless settings.
If you see a filter with a star, it means that the filter is recommended by AdGuard team.
Message successfully sent. We will send a reply to the email address you have indicated.
until the other VPN app finishes its work. Tap to resume.
until the Internet connection is back online. Tap to resume.

If this option is enabled, AdGuard will update ad filters automatically.

Extensions can change data on your device.
Add extensions from trusted sources only.
AdGuard can extend web sites functionality working as a cross-browser userscript manager.

"If this option is enabled, AdGuard filters the traffic of all applications. Otherwise it filters only browser traffic."

Help us with browsing security development
This option will become available if you select the Local HTTP proxy filtering mode
Using this logging level can significantly slow down your web browsing. Are you sure you want to use this logging level?
Check web pages with our phishing and malware filters.
Update over Wi-Fi to save cellular data
Starts a safeguard service in another process that checks if the main service is alive and restarts it if necessary. Zero disables it.
One of the following features is enabled: full logging, capturing HAR or PCAP. Tap to disable.

It means that AdGuard does not route your traffic through a remote server. Filtering is done right on your device.
